source.description: Like TreeCompass, but with comments and PIs off the root. PI targets vary. All text nodes must have non-whitespace characters.
Simple document with all node kinds
Source document for namespace copy modes

test-case.name: Constr-cont-entref-1
test-case.description: Pre-defined entity reference in element content

test-case.name: Constr-cont-entref-2
test-case.description: Pre-defined entity reference in element content

test-case.name: Constr-cont-entref-3
test-case.description: Pre-defined entity reference in element content

test-case.name: Constr-cont-entref-4
test-case.description: Pre-defined entity reference in element content

test-case.name: Constr-cont-entref-5
test-case.description: Pre-defined entity reference in element content

test-case.name: Constr-cont-text-1
test-case.description: count text nodes for direct element content

test-case.name: Constr-cont-text-2
test-case.description: count text nodes for direct element content and CDATA section

test-case.name: Constr-cont-enclexpr-1
test-case.description: 1 text node for enclosed expression with atomic values

test-case.name: Constr-cont-enclexpr-2
test-case.description: 1 text node for enclosed expression with atomic values

test-case.name: Constr-cont-enclexpr-3
test-case.description: space between atomic values in enclosed expression

test-case.name: Constr-cont-enclexpr-4
test-case.description: enclosed expression with mix of atomic values and nodes

test-case.name: Constr-cont-enclexpr-5
test-case.description: space between atomic values and empty string

test-case.name: Constr-cont-nested-5
test-case.description: Copied node structure in element content

test-case.name: Constr-cont-nodeid-1
test-case.description: Copied element node has new node identity
test-case.test: for $x in <a/>, $y in <elem>{$x}</elem> return exactly-one($y/a) is $x

test-case.name: Constr-cont-nodeid-2
test-case.description: Copied attribute node has new node identity
test-case.test: for $x in <a b="b"/>, $y in <elem>{$x/@b}</elem> return $y/@b is $x/@b

test-case.name: Constr-cont-nodeid-3
test-case.description: Copied comment node has new node identity
test-case.test: for $x in <!--comment-->, $y in <elem>{$x}</elem> return exactly-one($y/comment()) is $x

test-case.name: Constr-cont-nodeid-4
test-case.description: Copied pi node has new node identity
test-case.test: for $x in <?pi content?>, $y in <elem>{$x}</elem> return exactly-one($y/processing-instruction()) is $x

test-case.name: Constr-cont-nodeid-5
test-case.description: Copied text node has new node identity
test-case.test: for $x in text, $y in {$x/text()} return exactly-one($y/text()) is exactly-one($x/text())

test-case.name: Constr-cont-constrmod-3
test-case.test: declare construction strip; <elem>{//*:decimal}</elem>/* cast as xs:integer

test-case.name: Constr-cont-constrmod-4
test-case.test: declare construction preserve; <elem>{//*:decimal}</elem>/* cast as xs:integer

test-case.name: Constr-cont-constrmod-7
test-case.test: declare construction strip; (<elem>{//*:decimal/@*:attr}</elem>)/@*:attr cast as xs:integer

test-case.name: Constr-cont-constrmod-8
test-case.test: declare construction preserve; (<elem>{//*:decimal/@*:attr}</elem>)/@*:attr cast as xs:integer

test-case.name: Constr-cont-nsmode-5
test-case.test: declare copy-namespaces no-preserve, inherit; declare construction preserve; <new>{ //*:QName }</new>

test-case.name: Constr-cont-nsmode-6
test-case.test: declare copy-namespaces no-preserve, no-inherit; declare construction preserve; <new>{ //*:QName }</new>

test-case.name: Constr-cont-nsmode-7
test-case.description: Copy namespace sensitive content. See bug 4151
test-case.test: declare namespace atomic = "http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; declare copy-namespaces no-preserve, inherit; declare construction preserve; <new>{ (//atomic:QName/@atomic:attr)[1] }</new>

test-case.name: Constr-cont-nsmode-8
test-case.description: Copy namespace sensitive content. See bug 4151

test-case.name: Constr-cont-nsmode-9
test-case.description: Copy namespace sensitive content. See bug 4151. This test succeeds: a namespace-sensitive element can be copied if copy-namespaces=preserve, and its namespace-sensitive attribute can be copied if its parent element is copied

test-case.name: Constr-cont-nsmode-11
test-case.description: Test copying of potentially namespace-sensitive nodes preserves their type correctly.

test-case.name: Constr-cont-uripres-1
test-case.description: Preserve base uri for copied element nodes

test-case.name: Constr-cont-adjtext-1
test-case.description: single text node in element content

test-case.name: Constr-cont-adjtext-2
test-case.description: two text nodes in element content

test-case.name: Constr-cont-adjtext-4
test-case.description: no text node for empty sequence constructed

test-case.name: Constr-cont-attr-7
test-case.description: attribute in content with same name

test-case.name: Constr-cont-attr-8
test-case.description: attributes direct and in content with same name

test-case.name: Constr-cont-document-1
test-case.description: Check the merging of text nodes introduced by the contents of a document node This test case was motivated by the resolution of Bug Report 3637

test-case.name: Constr-cont-document-2
test-case.description: Check the merging of text nodes introduced by the contents of a document node This test case was motivated by the resolution of Bug Report 3637

test-case.name: Constr-cont-document-3

modified.change: redesigned to avoid the large output file (query is essentially unchanged)

test-case.name: Constr-cont-document-4
test-case.description: Check the merging of text nodes introduced by the contents of a document node. This test case was motivated by the resolution of Bug Report #3637

test-case.name: Constr-cont-document-5
test-case.description: Check the merging of text nodes introduced by the contents of a document node. This test case was motivated by the resolution of Bug Report #3637

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-5
test-case.description: Test that the typed value of element nodes is correct.

test-case.description: Test that the typed value of element nodes is correct.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-7
test-case.description: Test that the typed value of element nodes is correct.
test-case.test: <name>some, if(1) then else</name> instance of element()

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-8
test-case.description: Test that the typed of element nodes is correct.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-9
test-case.description: Test that the typed value of comment nodes is correct.
test-case.test: data(<!-- a comment -->) instance of xs:string

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-10
test-case.description: Test that the typed value of comment nodes is correct.
test-case.test: not(data(<!-- a comment -->) instance of xs:untypedAtomic)

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-11
test-case.description: Test that the typed value of comment nodes is correct.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-12
test-case.description: Test that the typed value of comment nodes is correct.
test-case.test: not(<!-- a comment --> instance of xs:untypedAtomic)

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-13
test-case.description: Test that the typed value of comment nodes is correct.
test-case.test: not(<!-- a comment --> instance of xs:string)

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-14
test-case.description: Test that the typed value of PI nodes is correct.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-15
test-case.description: Test that the typed value of PI nodes is correct.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-16
test-case.description: Test that the typed value of PI nodes is correct.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-17
test-case.description: Test that the typed value of PI nodes is correct.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-25
test-case.description: XQuery comments inside elements are not recognized.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-26
test-case.description: Enclosed expressions in element content must have expressions.

modified.change: Empty enclosed expression now allowed in 3.1

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-26a
test-case.description: Enclosed expressions in element content may be empty in 3.1.

modified.change: Empty enclosed expression now allowed in 3.1

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-26b
test-case.description: Enclosed expressions in element content may be empty in 3.1.

modified.change: Empty enclosed expression now allowed in 3.1

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-28
test-case.description: Ensure CDATA doesn't receive special attention.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-29
test-case.description: Test that the type annotation of text nodes is correct.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-30
test-case.description: Two atomic values with a text node inbetween.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-31
test-case.description: Two atomic values with a text node inbetween(#2).

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-32
test-case.description: Tests the type of the typed value of a directly constructed element node.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-33
test-case.description: Tests the typed value of a directly constructed element node.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-34
test-case.description: Check that a directly constructed element gets the right type.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-35
test-case.description: Check that a directly constructed element gets the right type(#2).

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-35a
test-case.description: Check that a directly constructed element gets the right type(#2).

modified.change: variant of -35 for 3.0 processors supporting typed data: see bugs 22768, 11585, 20828

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-35b
test-case.description: Check that a directly constructed element gets the right type(#2).

modified.change: variant of -35 for 3.0 processors NOT supporting typed data: see bugs 22768, 11585, 20828

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-36
test-case.description: Check that a directly constructed element gets the right type(#3).
test-case.test: declare construction strip; <e/> instance of element(*, xs:untyped)

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-37
test-case.description: Check that a directly constructed element gets the right type, and that the name test fails.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-38
test-case.description: Check that a directly constructed element gets the right type, and that the name test fails(#2).
test-case.test: declare construction strip; <e/> instance of element(b, xs:untyped)

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-46
test-case.description: Have an empty text node constructor between two atomic values.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-47
test-case.description: Have an text node constructor that constructs an empty string, between two atomic values.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemContent-48
cbcl-ns-fixup-1
test-case.description: Ensure that namespace fixup occurs when namespace prefix names clash
test-case.test: let $x := <ns:foo xmlns:ns="http://www.w3.org/foo" ns:attr="foo" /> return let $y := <ns:foo xmlns:ns="http://www.w3.org/bar" ns:attr="bar" /> return let $z := <root> { $x/@*, $y/@* } </root> return count(distinct-values(in-scope-prefixes($z)))

test-case.name: ElemContentArray-002
test-case.description: Element constructor with array content constructing elements
